jade.security

Interface JADECertificate

  • All Superinterfaces:
    jade.security.Credentials, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DelegationCertificate
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicCertificateImpl, DelegationCertificateImpl, GroupCertificate, NameCertificate, OwnershipCertificate

    public interface JADECertificate
extends jade.security.Credentials
    The JADECeritificate interface has to be implemented by classes storing authenticated informations, as identities or delegated permissions.
    Version:
    $Date: 2004-07-13 11:47:37 +0200 (mar, 13 lug 2004) $ $Revision: 394 $
    Author:
    Michele Tomaiuolo - Universita` di Parma

      jade.security.JADEPrincipal getSubject()
      Returns the subject of this certificate.
      void setIssuer(jade.security.JADEPrincipal issuer)
      Sets the issuer of this certificate, i.e. the principal which signs this certificate.

      Sets the validity period.
      void setNotBefore(java.util.Date notBefore)
      Sets the validity period.
      void setSubject(jade.security.JADEPrincipal subject)
      Sets the subject of this certificate, i.e. the principal which the carried informations refer to.

      • getEncoded

        byte[] getEncoded()
           throws CertificateEncodingException
        Returns the canonical string representation of this certificate. This string can be used to evaluate a digest and to sign the certificate itself.
        Returns:
        The canonical string representation.
        Throws:
        CertificateEncodingException
